title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.10 - Courtesy required of visiting room supervisor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.10 - Courtesy required of visiting room supervisor

State Regulations

The employee in charge of the visiting room shall be
courteous to visitors and at the same time alert and
vigilant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
